rules_text:
[i](As a Siege enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it's defeated, exile it, then cast it transformed.)[/i]
Flash
When The Battle of Christophsis enters, reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
rules_text2:
Whenever a creature you control leaves the battlefield without dying, Ahsoka Tano can't be blocked this turn.
Meditate–{1}{U}, Pay 3 life [i]({1}{U}, Pay 3 life: Return this permanent to its owner's hand. Meditate only as a sorcery.)[/i]
